name: Nitro Trucks
overview: Smash your way to victory in Nitro Trucks® – a rowdy offroad racing game from the team that brought you MotoGP! Select from 14 upgradeable trucks and get ’em dirty on 6 exciting tracks. Pick up power-ups to repair your vehicle and earn nitro boosts – then hit the RAM button to show your opponents who’s boss! An immersive cabinet design puts you in the driver’s seat – complete with roll cage, 5.1 surround sound speakers, LED lighting, and force feedback steering wheel. Connect up to 8 games for a rip-roarin’ good time!
